body:
Suppress two `-Wmaybe-uninitialized` warnings in `indirect_ptr(...)`:

```
[â¦]
./prevector.h: In function âbool IsWitnessStandard(const CTransaction&, const CCoinsViewCache&)â:
./prevector.h:162:79: warning: âprevScript.prevector<28, unsigned char>::_union.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<anonymous>.prevector<28, unsigned char>
     ::direct_or_indirect::<unnamed struct>::indirectâ may be used uninitialized in this 
     function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]

     T* indirect_ptr(difference_type pos) { return reinterpret_cast<T*>(_union.indirect) + pos; }
                                                                        ~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~

[â¦]
In file included from ./hash.h:11:0,
                 from ./pubkey.h:10,
                 from ./key.h:10,
                 from test/script_p2sh_tests.cpp:7:
./prevector.h: In member function âvoid script_p2sh_tests::sign::test_method()â:
./prevector.h:162:79: warning: âsigSave.prevector<28, unsigned char>::_union.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<anonymous>.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<unnamed struct>::indirectâ may be used uninitialized in this function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
     T* indirect_ptr(difference_type pos) { return reinterpret_cast<T*>(_union.indirect) + pos; }
                                                                        ~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~
./prevector.h:181:69: warning: âsigSave.prevector<28, unsigned char>::_union.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<anonymous>.prevector<28, unsigned char>::direct_or_indirect::<unnamed struct>::indirectâ may be used uninitialized in this function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
                 _union.indirect = static_cast<char*>(realloc(_union.indirect, ((size_t)sizeof(T)) * new_capacity));
                                                              ~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~
[â¦]
```
title: prevector: Suppress two -Wmaybe-uninitialized (gcc) warnings in indirect_ptr(...)
